title: Major improvements to autograd + a couple of CUDA improvements
body_html: This is a huge modification to autograd. All core functions and types are moved to C (however they can still be used in python using the same interface - see BasicEngine). This improves RNN training speed on Penn Treebank more than 2x (and can actually saturate a GPU with a small RNN during backward).
body_text: This is a huge modification to autograd. All core functions and types are moved to C (however they can still be used in python using the same interface - see BasicEngine). This improves RNN training speed on Penn Treebank more than 2x (and can actually saturate a GPU with a small RNN during backward).
body: This is a huge modification to autograd. All core functions and types are moved to C (however they can still be used in python using the same interface - see `BasicEngine`). This improves RNN training speed on Penn Treebank more than 2x (and can actually saturate a GPU with a small RNN during backward).
